room_title: Escape room "Secret Society" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
room_description:
Congratulations! You have been selected to join an ancient secret society! But in order to become a member, you have to pass the Initiation. Their methods may have stayed in the medieval times: you awake in an unfamiliar place, locked in a mysterious room. The stakes are higher than ever! You must solve all the puzzles in 60 minutes and escape, or else be trapped here forever...
This escape room can hold up to ten people as long as youâ€™re all in the same group. This escape room is also available for head-to-head competition in two identical rooms. This will allow for groups of 16-20 to participate in the two rooms in a race with the clock and one another.
